Convert a data frame to common units

Source: R/utilities-units.R
dot-unitConverter.Rd

Convert a data frame to common units

Usage

.unitConverter(data, xUnit = NULL, yUnit = NULL)

Arguments

data

A data frame (or a tibble) from DataCombined$toDataFrame().

xUnit, yUnit

Target units for xValues and yValues, respectively. If not specified (NULL), first of the existing units in the respective columns (xUnit and yUnit) will be selected as the common unit. For available dimensions and units, see ospsuite::ospDimensions and ospsuite::ospUnits, respectively.

See also

toUnit

Examples


# small dataframe to illustrate the conversion
(df <- dplyr::tibble(
  dataType = c(rep("simulated", 3), rep("observed", 3)),
  xValues = c(0, 14.482, 28.965, 0, 1, 2),
  xUnit = "min",
  xDimension = "Time",
  yValues = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
  yUnit = c("mol", "mol", "mol", "g", "g", "g"),
  yDimension = c("Amount", "Amount", "Amount", "Mass", "Mass", "Mass"),
  yErrorValues = c(2.747, 2.918, 2.746, NA, NA, NA),
  yErrorUnit = c("mol", "mol", "mol", "g", "g", "g"),
  molWeight = c(10, 10, 20, 20, 20, 10)
))
#> # A tibble: 6 x 10
#>   dataType  xValues xUnit xDimen~1 yValues yUnit yDime~2 yErro~3 yErro~4 molWe~5
#>   <chr>       <dbl> <chr> <chr>      <dbl> <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>     <dbl>
#> 1 simulated     0   min   Time           1 mol   Amount     2.75 mol          10
#> 2 simulated    14.5 min   Time           1 mol   Amount     2.92 mol          10
#> 3 simulated    29.0 min   Time           1 mol   Amount     2.75 mol          20
#> 4 observed      0   min   Time           1 g     Mass      NA    g            20
#> 5 observed      1   min   Time           1 g     Mass      NA    g            20
#> 6 observed      2   min   Time           1 g     Mass      NA    g            10
#> # ... with abbreviated variable names 1: xDimension, 2: yDimension,
#> #   3: yErrorValues, 4: yErrorUnit, 5: molWeight

# default conversion
ospsuite:::.unitConverter(df)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 10
#>   dataType  xValues xUnit xDimen~1 yValues yUnit yDime~2 yErro~3 yErro~4 molWe~5
#>   <chr>       <dbl> <chr> <chr>      <dbl> <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>     <dbl>
#> 1 simulated     0   min   Time          10 g     Amount     27.5 g            10
#> 2 simulated    14.5 min   Time          10 g     Amount     29.2 g            10
#> 3 simulated    29.0 min   Time          20 g     Amount     54.9 g            20
#> 4 observed      0   min   Time           1 g     Mass       NA   g            20
#> 5 observed      1   min   Time           1 g     Mass       NA   g            20
#> 6 observed      2   min   Time           1 g     Mass       NA   g            10
#> # ... with abbreviated variable names 1: xDimension, 2: yDimension,
#> #   3: yErrorValues, 4: yErrorUnit, 5: molWeight

# customizing conversion with specified unit(s)
ospsuite:::.unitConverter(df, xUnit = ospUnits$Time$h)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 10
#>   dataType  xValues xUnit xDimen~1 yValues yUnit yDime~2 yErro~3 yErro~4 molWe~5
#>   <chr>       <dbl> <chr> <chr>      <dbl> <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>     <dbl>
#> 1 simulated  0      h     Time          10 g     Amount     27.5 g            10
#> 2 simulated  0.241  h     Time          10 g     Amount     29.2 g            10
#> 3 simulated  0.483  h     Time          20 g     Amount     54.9 g            20
#> 4 observed   0      h     Time           1 g     Mass       NA   g            20
#> 5 observed   0.0167 h     Time           1 g     Mass       NA   g            20
#> 6 observed   0.0333 h     Time           1 g     Mass       NA   g            10
#> # ... with abbreviated variable names 1: xDimension, 2: yDimension,
#> #   3: yErrorValues, 4: yErrorUnit, 5: molWeight
ospsuite:::.unitConverter(df, yUnit = ospUnits$Mass$kg)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 10
#>   dataType  xValues xUnit xDimen~1 yValues yUnit yDime~2 yErro~3 yErro~4 molWe~5
#>   <chr>       <dbl> <chr> <chr>      <dbl> <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>     <dbl>
#> 1 simulated     0   min   Time       0.01  kg    Amount   0.0275 kg           10
#> 2 simulated    14.5 min   Time       0.01  kg    Amount   0.0292 kg           10
#> 3 simulated    29.0 min   Time       0.02  kg    Amount   0.0549 kg           20
#> 4 observed      0   min   Time       0.001 kg    Mass    NA      kg           20
#> 5 observed      1   min   Time       0.001 kg    Mass    NA      kg           20
#> 6 observed      2   min   Time       0.001 kg    Mass    NA      kg           10
#> # ... with abbreviated variable names 1: xDimension, 2: yDimension,
#> #   3: yErrorValues, 4: yErrorUnit, 5: molWeight
ospsuite:::.unitConverter(df, xUnit = ospUnits$Time$s, yUnit = ospUnits$Amount$mmol)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 10
#>   dataType  xValues xUnit xDimen~1 yValues yUnit yDime~2 yErro~3 yErro~4 molWe~5
#>   <chr>       <dbl> <chr> <chr>      <dbl> <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>     <dbl>
#> 1 simulated      0  s     Time        1000 mmol  Amount     2747 mmol         10
#> 2 simulated    869. s     Time        1000 mmol  Amount     2918 mmol         10
#> 3 simulated   1738. s     Time        1000 mmol  Amount     2746 mmol         20
#> 4 observed       0  s     Time          50 mmol  Mass         NA mmol         20
#> 5 observed      60  s     Time          50 mmol  Mass         NA mmol         20
#> 6 observed     120  s     Time         100 mmol  Mass         NA mmol         10
#> # ... with abbreviated variable names 1: xDimension, 2: yDimension,
#> #   3: yErrorValues, 4: yErrorUnit, 5: molWeight
